@context.description: The context for the verifiable credential.

id.description: The identifier for the verifiable credential.

type.description: The types of the data stored in the verifiable credential.

credentialSubject.description: The data for the verifiable credential.

credentialStatus.description: Used to discover information about the current status of the verifiable credential, such as whether it is suspended or revoked.

issuanceDate.description: The date the verifiable credential was issued.

proof.description: Proofs that the verifiable credential is valid. Optional if a different proof method is used, such as JWT.
